entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Dawncaster: Deckbuilding RPG
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Vaul of the Void Promo PackÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Masks of MiseryÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Siege of ShadowsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Dawncaster Mega BundleÔºö‚Ç∫599,99
  • Death of DivinityÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Dawncaster Origins BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Tribes of TwilightÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Infernal InvasionsÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Eclypse Supporter PackÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Infinitum Support BannerÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

Dawncaster: Epic Deck-Building Adventure Dive into a world of strategy and magic in Dawncaster, the ultimate deck-building experience with over 900 stunning hand-illustrated cards. Will you become a shadow-dancing rogue, an indomitable warrior, a mysterious Seeker, or forge your own path? Unravel the dark secrets of Aethos in this tactical masterpiece that revolutionizes mobile card gaming. Redefining Card Games - Experience groundbreaking mechanics that seasoned players will love - Blend unique class abilities with powerful weapons and enchantments - Master an innovative energy system, freeing you from traditional deckbuilder constraints A World Shrouded in Mystery - Embark on a quest to find the legendary 'Dawnbringer' lost in the corrupted realm of Umbris - Immerse yourself in a richly illustrated world with compelling dialogue and meaningful choices - Shape the fate of a desperate world through your actions Complete Gaming Experience - Unlock all cards and classes with your purchase - no microtransactions! - Open up new exciting area's with optional expansion packs for even more content - Enjoy a premium game free from ads, timers, or pay-to-win mechanics Endless Replayability - Every run is unique with randomized encounters and battles - Unlock new starting cards, portraits, and challenges - Test your skills with increasing difficulty levels Join the Dawncaster Community - Connect with fellow players and developers on the Discord server - Share strategies, get the latest updates, and influence the game's future - Be part of a passionate community that's shaping the future of Dawncaster Ready to answer the call? Download Dawncaster now and begin your legendary journey! Discord: https://discord.gg/pfeMG9c Website: https://dawncaster.wanderlost.games

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Bother Bin
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Mental clutter drains your energy. Bother Bin lets you offload anxious thoughts and record your progress, transforming chaos into organized achievement‚Äîone small victory after another. Bother Bin isn‚Äôt a task list or To-Do app. The goal isn‚Äôt to ‚Äúcheck off‚Äù items, but to continuously explore. Even if an attempt doesn‚Äôt solve the problem, it‚Äôs worth leaving a footprint to remind yourself you‚Äôre always moving forward. Why People Love It ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt live without it anymore! I‚Äôve written all my recent anxieties here, and watching them get solved one by one gives me so much hope in life!‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the best app I‚Äôve ever used. Deceptively simple interface, incredibly powerful results. My whole life feels more organized now!‚Äù ‚ÄúWhenever I can‚Äôt sleep, I open the app, dump my thoughts, and drift off.‚Äù ‚ÄúSeeing each tiny win time-stamped keeps me motivated to finish.‚Äù Key Features ‚Ä¢ One-Tap Brain Dump ‚Äì Capture any thought, worry, or idea before it spirals. ‚Ä¢ Time-Stamped Progress Log ‚Äì Record every small win and see momentum build along an auto-sorted timeline. ‚Ä¢ Smart Status Chips ‚Äì Switch between Idea, In Progress, and Solved to stay laser-focused. ‚Ä¢ 100 % Offline Storage ‚Äì Data stays on your device only. No ads, no tracking, no cookies or data collection. No Internet connection required. ‚Ä¢ Light & Dark Modes ‚Äì Easy on the eyes, automatically follows your system theme. Perfect For ‚Ä¢ Overthinkers & Insomniacs who need instant mind relief. ‚Ä¢ ADHD Makers & Creatives who work best by offloading rapid-fire ideas. ‚Ä¢ Procrastinators who break the paralysis with micro-progress tracking. ‚Ä¢ Startup Founders & Product Builders tracking daily execution. ‚Ä¢ Worry Warriors who transform daily stress into manageable action steps. ‚Ä¢ Learners & Habit-Hackers who stay motivated by watching solved counts climb. Your success story begins with a single worry recorded and transforms into countless victories celebrated. Every small step forward is rewriting what‚Äôs possible in your life. Download Bother Bin today and give your mind the space it deserves.

entry.title: iSocketTool
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Encourage us, Buy me a coffeeÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Encourage us, Donate CokeÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

The network debugging tool is a TCP&UDP communication debugging tool with rich functions, clear interface, and easy to use. It can assist network maintenance personnel and program developers to debug the network. The main features include: 1. Integrated TCP client and server; UDP client and server 2. Support Ping 3. Support Ping Monitor(Timed automatic Ping server) 4. Support UDP Broadcast 5. Support Multicast 6. Support Port Scan 7. Support TraceRoute 8. Support Lan Scan 9. Support Whois 10. Support Command Panel 11. Multi-client link management at the same time 12. Automatically send messages at regular intervals 13. Support hexadecimal, UTF-8, Unicode, GBK character encoding switching 14. Automatically cache the last message sent

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Halls of Torment: Premium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫179,99 [‚Ç∫179,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

Halls of Torment is a horde survival game with a pre-rendered retro look reminiscent of RPGs from the late 90s. Choose one of many hero characters and descend into the deadly Halls of Torment. Fight unholy horrors from beyond and survive wave after wave of enemies until you face one of the tormented Lords. Strengthen your hero with character traits, abilities, and items. Create a new powerful build during each run. Explore various underground expanses and find new powerful items that enable you to venture even deeper into the abyss. First available on Steam, the 90's-style RPG survival roguelike, Halls of Torment, is now making its debut on mobile! „ÄêFeatures„Äë ‚óÜ Quick and casual 30 minute runs ‚óÜ Old school pre-rendered art style ‚óÜ Quest-based meta progression ‚óÜ Large selection of diverse abilities, traits, and items, all enabling you to create interesting synergies ‚óÜ Diverse bosses featuring unique mechanics and attack patterns ‚óÜ Several distinct characters allowing for many different play styles ‚óÜ Unlock and explore multiple interesting and challenging underground worlds ‚óÜ Unique items can be sent up to the overworld and used to customize future runs ‚óÜ Craft magical tinctures to direct fate in your favor ‚óÜ Unlock the power of each class and combine them with your chosen character ‚óÜ Find rare item variants to further improve your builds „ÄêFull Content List„Äë ‚óÜ6 stages with unique environments ‚óÜ11 playable characters & character marks ‚óÜ25 blessings that make you stronger for each run ‚óÜ60 unique items to retrieve and unlock ‚óÜ240 higher rarity item variants ‚óÜ74 abilities and ability upgrades ‚óÜ30 artifacts to customize your game experience ‚óÜ35+ unique bosses ‚óÜ70+ unique monsters ‚óÜ500 quests to complete ‚óÜ1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities ‚óÜ 1000+ traits that upgrade characters and abilities Our content list is still growing, expect more in the future! „ÄêContact Us„Äë Discord: @Erabit or join via https://discord.gg/Gkje2gzCqB Email: prglobal@erabitstudios.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DungeonSquad
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Season PassÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Nurse PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • AutonomyÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Mecha PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Unlock BeholderÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Unlock GumihoÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Season 3 Battle PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Uniform PackÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • Unlock BaphometÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Season 2 Battle PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

The new game of the developer ""GameCoaster"", who made Dungeon Maker and Dungeon Defense! A seemingly infinite stream of heroes invaded the dungeon and brought ruin to the Abyss. Now you must go straight to the source of the enemy and return your home to its former glory. Defeat the Army of Light and take back the power of the Abyss. You are tasked with infiltrating a planet dominated by light all on your own. You must bring down the heroes and use them to summon monsters to fight alongside you, armed with the equipment of these fallen sacrifices. Once you are strong enough, you may receive the blessings of the Dark Gods, and combine their powers with those of your monsters to bring down colossal groups of enemies. ‚óá 10 elite monsters and over 100 unique skills ‚óá The Power of the Abyss gets stronger as you rebuild ‚óá Roguelike with random choices and opportunities

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫1.799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫119,99 [‚Ç∫119,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.799,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

In-App Purchases

  • 8mm ProÔºö‚Ç∫119,99
  • Silent Film ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Light Leak ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00
  • Countdown ThemeÔºö‚Ç∫0,00

Application Description

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS ‚Ä¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies ‚Ä¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style ‚Ä¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm ‚Ä¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes ‚Ä¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription ‚Ä¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes ‚Ä¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. ‚Ä¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you‚Äôll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off
